channel.title: News - Leviathans Fleet Builder
channel.description: Updates about the Leviathans Fleet Builder

item.title: Search
item.description: You can now search the list of available components.

item.title: Preview: Visual List
item.description: Preview mode has images in the component list.

item.title: Breach Numbers
item.description: Breach numbers have been added to ship pages.

item.title: Copy Markdown
item.description: Now featuring a convenient button for copying the current fleet.

item.title: Required Slots
item.description: The fleet builder now has support for filtering the list of leviathans.

item.title: Completed the Catalog
item.description: The fleet builder now has data for all of cards.

item.title: Crumbs & RSS
item.description: Breadcrumb navigation and RSS for news posts

item.title: Proper Names & Fleet Summary
item.description: The Leviathans Fleet Builder site now italicizes ship names and has a sticky header.

item.title: Catalog of Aerial Warfare
item.description: The Leviathans Fleet Builder site now has a Catalog of Aerial Warfare section.
